title: 107_hr3898
content: Capital Construction Fund Qualified Withdrawal Act of 2002 - Amends the Merchant Marine Act and the Internal Revenue Code to permit as qualified withdrawals from fishing capital construction funds money used by retiring fishermen for the following purposes: (1) retiring an owner's commercial fishing vessels and related commercial fishing permits. (2) making a rollover contribution into an owner's individual retirement plan. And (3) making a payment of an industry fee authorized by the fishing capacity reduction program.
